text:
When apache is run from daemontools with -DFOREGROUND as a startup 
parameter, and the apache daemontools service gets killed, it kills 
processes outside the process group as well. This behaviour doesn't appear 
to exist in apache 1.3.26+ when using the -F option at startup.

See also http://cr.yp.to/daemontools/faq/create.html#pgrphack for more 
information regarding this subject.
creator: johan-apache@localhost.nl

text:
I'm not really an expert in this, but this report seems very unlikely to me.
Apache will not kill any process that it does not create.  If it did,
I think we would be hearing many other complaints.

Can you provide more details?
creator: slive@apache.org
